scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix backend run lint:fix && npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix
scripts.predev: npm install --silent && cd backend && npm install --silent || true
scripts.docker:up: docker compose -p ministerra -f backend/docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d redis-primary redis-replica1 redis-sentinel1 redis-sentinel2 redis-sentinel3 mysql mysql-replica mysql-replica-init prometheus grafana loki promtail-dev tempo otel-collector node-exporter cadvisor redis-exporter mysqld-exporter blackbox-exporter traefik || docker-compose -p ministerra -f backend/docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d redis-primary redis-replica1 redis-sentinel1 redis-sentinel2 redis-sentinel3 mysql mysql-replica mysql-replica-init prometheus grafana loki promtail-dev tempo otel-collector node-exporter cadvisor redis-exporter mysqld-exporter blackbox-exporter traefik
scripts.docker:down: npx --prefix backend tsx backend/scripts/docker-clean.ts backend/docker-compose.yml ministerra
scripts.docker:down:all: npx --prefix backend tsx backend/scripts/docker-clean.ts backend/docker-compose.yml ministerra --prune-volumes
scripts.dev: npm run docker:down:dev && npm run docker:up && concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,blue "npm --prefix backend start" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
